titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by committees of the Senate for the periods March 1, 2025, through September 30, 2025, October 1, 2025, through September 30, 2026, and October 1, 2026, through February 28, 2027.

An original resolution authorizing expenditures by committees of the Senate for the periods March 1, 2025, through September 30, 2025, October 1, 2025, through September 30, 2026, and October 1, 2026, through February 28, 2027.

action.text: Committee on Rules and Administration. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator McConnell. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 16.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
